description.english: Listen to all Zager tapes found in Episode 1
description.brazilian: Escute todas as fitas do Zager encontradas no Episódio 1
description.french: Écouter toutes les cassettes de Zager de l'épisode 1.
description.german: Hör die alle von Zagers Kassetten an, die in Episode 1 gefunden werden können.
description.russian: Прослушайте все аудиокассеты Загера, найденные в Эпизоде 1.
description.spanish: Escucha todas las cintas de Zager del primer episodio.

description.english: Scan all OMNI View items in Episode 1
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os itens escaneáveis pelo OMNI View no Episódio 1
description.french: Scanner tous les objets en mode Vue OMNI de l'épisode 1.
description.german: Scanne alle OMNI-View-Gegenstände in Episode 1.
description.russian: Отсканируйте все предметы OMNI View в Эпизоде 1.
description.spanish: Escanea todos los objetos en modo OMNIvisión.

description.english: Help Hope collect all banned books and game carts found in Episode 1
description.german: Hilf Hope dabei, alle verbotenen Bücher und Disks aus Episode 1 zu finden.
description.french: Aidez Hope à collecter tous les livres et disques interdits trouvés dans l'épisode 1.
description.spanish: Ayudar a Hope a recoger todos los libros y disquetes prohibidos en el Episodio 1.
description.russian: Помогите Хоуп собрать все запрещенные книги и диски с играми в Эпизоде 1.
description.brazilian: Ajude Hope a recolher todos os livros e discos banidos no Episódio 1

description.english: Looked through every camera in Episode 1
description.brazilian: Examine cada sala no Episódio 1
description.french: Examiner toutes les pièces de l'épisode 1.
description.german: Spioniere jeden Raum in Episode 1 aus.
description.russian: Исследуйте все комнаты в Эпизоде 1.
description.spanish: Examina todas las habitaciones del episodio 1.

description.english: Complete Episode 1
description.brazilian: Termine o Episódio 1
description.french: Terminer l'épisode 1.
description.german: Schließe Episode 1 ab.
description.russian: Завершите Эпизод 1.
description.spanish: Termina el episodio 1.
